name: CityBuild Academy
description: Free construction job training with union apprenticeship placement
fullDescription: CityBuild Academy is San Francisco's pre-apprenticeship construction training program, providing free job training and placement into union construction careers.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free 18-week construction training
- Union apprenticeship placement
- OSHA and safety certifications
- Math and blueprint reading
- Supportive services (transportation, tools)
- Placement into trades (electrical, plumbing, carpentry)
howToGetIt:
1. Attend CityBuild orientation session
2. Complete application and interview
3. Pass assessment tests
4. Commit to full 18-week program
5. Graduate and enter union apprenticeship
